(Simplified: 虮)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 幾 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 幾 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
①(蟣子)蝨的卵。
蟣子 [ jǐ zi ]: louse egg; nit
(Simplified: 虮)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 幾 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 虮

Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:蟣

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+87E3

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: Not exist

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:虮

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+866E

Main pronunciation 主要发音: jǐ

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning nit, egg of a louse (simplification of 蟣).

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 虮子 jǐ zǐ (nit)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 蝨子也一曰齊謂蛭曰蟣從虫幾聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 蟣 from insect 虫 chóng and phonetic stool-loom (几)幾 jǐ (not- 𠘧 shū) simp 虮.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
虮蟣

Variant rule clarification :

Applied rules : B044 几幾

jǐ

蟣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐ］
［《廣韻》居狶切，上尾，見。］
“虮1”的繁体字。
(1)虱的卵。
(2)酒面上的浮沫。

蟣字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟣； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1097第11
【集韻】舉豈切，音幾。【說文】蝨子也。【前漢·嚴安傳】介冑生蟣蝨。【沈約·憫國賦】蓄素蟣于?胄。　又【韻會】居希切，音飢。義同。　又【廣韻】渠希切，音祈。【爾雅·釋魚】蛭，蟣。【註】今江東呼水中蛭蟲入人肉者爲蟣。見蛭字註。

虮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　虮; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1097 Page 11
【Ji Yun】How to cut, how many sounds. [Said the text] lice too. 【Previous Han·Yan An Biography】Jie Zhe gave birth to lice. [Shen Yue·Ming Guo Fu] Store Sui Yu Yu?　[Yunhui] Ju Xiqie, sound hungry. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Qu Xiqie, sound prayer. 【Erya·Shiyu】Leech, 虮. [Note] Today, those who call the water leechworms into human flesh in the east of the Yangtze River are called Gu. See the note on the word leeches.
